Reviews.Title: “HAD A BLAST!!!”
Reviews.Author: Marla N
Reviews.Content: What can I say, The room was spotless, the pool was spotless, and the breakfast was awesome. The staff was pleasant, and Daniel is a workaholic, This gentlemen was always working and always greeted you. We have stayed in other motels in the area and this was a great stay, it is walking distant from the boardwalk, and is pet friendly, we didn't take our pets but this is good to know so if we wanted to next time we could. We will be back and thanks for a great stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Another great Stay”
Reviews.Author: jerryjbamat
Reviews.Content: Had another great 8 day stay at my favorite Daytona Hotel Great facilities, location and above all "super staff" Everyone there goes overboard to make my stay pleasant I do suggest getting reservations as this facility is obviously quite popular with travelers . Most of the rooms were occupied during my stay which was right after the July NASCAR race. I also noted there were a lot of repeat visitors that come to Daytona each summer for their vacations.

Reviews.Title: “Great Ocean Views”
Reviews.Author: Travelinggrandma001
Reviews.Content: The exterior of the motel is nice but when you enter the hallways, it appears to be an older hotel but is painted nicely. The deadbolt lock didn't work on our front door. but it was so late when we discovered it didn't work that we went to bed just using the top lock that loops over a bar. There was a nice balcony but the air conditioner cover was off and laying on the floor & we couldn't get it back on so just propped it up and told the grandson to stay away from it. The room itself was clean and the bed comfortable, but the blanket was very stiff and old looking - I pulled it off the bed - didn't want it near me. The air conditoner worked great and we slept well. Bathroom was clean but could use a hook on the door to hold a towel or clothes as you change into or out of of a bathing suit. The swimming pool walls looked sort of dirty. I was concerned that it was algae but it may have been sand. It was a good size and the kiddie pool was great for my grandson. The staff checking in and out was very friendly. They give out a red bracelet that is to be worn by all quests so they know you belong there. I like this concept as we have stayed in several motels in Daytona and I've seen people come from the beach, use the motel swimming pool then go back to the beach and get in their car and leave. We have also seen people at other motels park in the motel we were at because there wasn't enough places in the motel they were at, which made parking sparse! Breakfast was over at 10 and we were running late and didn't make it, but one of the other guests said it was ok. I do think they need to put some rubber mats on the floor in the elevator as the floor was very wet from people coming back from the poll but they had two elevators, which was great.

Reviews.Title: “Not at all pleased!”
Reviews.Author: Lifes-A-Beach31
Reviews.Content: Okay here goes...I checked in on Saturday after a very long drive and upon initial view it was okay. We ran out for food, came back and ate. Time for shower and bed...this is when it went downhill. The tub was dirty (I had to clean it), there was an old wash cloth hanging on the shower rail?!, the tub also had a very slow drain...but we endured since we were tired. One of the bulbs was out in the bathroom so it was very low light...no wonder it was'nt clean...they can't see! There was little piles of sand in the bathroom floor also??!! We have a 2 queen room oceanfront b/c no kings were available when we booked. The queen next to the balcony had long strands of hair all different colors...ewww! Overall room was'nt the cleanest. Sunday morning we reported the tub situation and the one bulb out situation to front desk, they were really pleasant and had george fix things accordingly. i told the housekeeper about the dirty wash cloth and she was apologetic...so we were okay at that point. Now Sunday night a HUGE flying cockrocah got in our room...I managed to get on the balcony and shut the door, the hubby was in hallway, the cockroach won the room. Hubby goes down to front desk for some type of pesticide or something to eradicate this sucker. Mimi at the front desk was very uncaring and asked hubby "What do you want me to do?", "I can move you". Not the best situation at almost 11 at night. So hubby comes back up and start packing (I'm still on balcony) he finally convinces me to run through room...by the way I only have a sheet wrapped around me...it was bath time! Picture that in the hallway! So hubby gets my clothes and I dress in HALLWAY!! I call Mimi from my cellphone to ask what room were going to. Mimi says you have to bring me your ID so you can get a new parking pass and room..huh! PRIORITIES!!! So, I ask Mimi if she has a bellhop to put our stuff on..."uhh, no". Okay I get to the first floor and bingo...bellhop! I send up to hubby and go to lobby. Mimi is sitting on her a**. I was instantly pissed! She could have at least had paperwork ready, key cards, and the all important parking pass ready...but not Mimi. So I asked who the manager was for Monday...Peggy Sue I was told. Now new room on the floor below had noisy toilet, noisy fridge, but much cleaner...yay! Monday morning...toilet in new room doesn't flush...go figure! Called and reported to front desk. they were very pleasant and said George would get right on it. Peggy s\Sue would not be in til 1 p.m?! Okay so I'm waiting for her arrival as I amstill here til Thursday! Dear God do not let anything else happen...to be cont.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised!!”
Reviews.Author: Sarah T
Reviews.Content: We just returned from our vacation in Florida and we stayed at the Comfort Inn and Suites for part of our trip. I have to say that I was pleasantly surprised and very happy with our choice to stay here. We had just come from Orlando where we stayed at a resort hotel connected with Seaworld and I can honestly say that I was way more impressed with Comfort Inn and Suites than I was with the other resort. Even though Comfort Inn and Suite doesn't come with all the bells and whistles it had what we needed and I felt very at home here. They had a great breakfast in the morning and free wireless in your rooms, something we didnt' have at the higher end resort in Orlando...go figure. The staff was more than accomodating and that place was very clean. I think that there wasn't a time I didin't see someone mopping up floors, sweeping, cleaning the halls etc... Our room was cleaned every day and new towels were provided. It was a great location, right near all the action and a wonderful view of the ocean. I would highly recommend this location for someone who doesn't need all the bells and whistles in a hotel but wants to have the basics and feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Vanna B”
Reviews.Author: VannaB05
Reviews.Content: I just want to said that the Comfort Inn & Suites at 730 North Atlantic Ave in Daytona Beach, Fl at is a great place to have a family reunion. Me and my family went to Daytona Beach, Fl on June 29 thru July 01,2012 and stay there. Angela and her staff went out of there way to make sure that my family have a great time especially with our barbara que on Saturday. There were just great and me and my family appreciated you all hospitality. Rooms was clean the carpet is fresh and view is awesome. This hotel is own the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Well below expectations”
Reviews.Author: Cheryl N
Reviews.Content: We have travelled extensively and stayed at many Comfort Suites. This hotel was well below the standards we have come to expect. The room was filthy and in poor condition. The door to the room had a very large gap which let in the heat as well as the noise. The smell of mold was intense. We come to Daytona often to hang out with friends, and this will be the last time we stay at this property.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay on the beach”
Reviews.Author: Dee M
Reviews.Content: We were in town for a youth bowling tournament and I wanted the kids to enjoy their free time on the beach. Sure...the hotel is an older model and sometimes the elevators were a bit scary but you can see the staff work very hard keeping the place clean and comfortable. We had an oceanfront view at a very affordable price. The boys had a great time on their boogie boards with the awesome waves! Breakfast was very good with a nice variety of food. The staff were always respectful and helpful. Will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Skip this place”
Reviews.Author: DFG1964
Reviews.Content: Hotel was run down, hallways and room smelled. Manager, Peggy Sue was obnoxious and difficult. The only redeeming feature was that it is on the beach side of A1A

Reviews.Title: “Repeat Customers since 1998”
Reviews.Author: Tina T
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been coming to Daytona Beach and staying at Comfort Inn & Suites in Daytona Beach at least twice a year since 1998. We understand this hotel is not brand new but it is maintained and kept very clean overall. The oceanfront views are wonderful!! The price for the oceanfront rooms is very reasonable. For us, the free contential breakfast is an added bonus. The staff are always pleasant and helpful. We like this location as it is within walking distance to the boardwalk and all of the local hot spots. We recommend this hotel to our family and friends all the time. Thanks Angie and your staff for always being there for us!!

Reviews.Title: “Great property!”
Reviews.Author: Tamara M
Reviews.Content: I am a travel proffesional,and this hotel is a great property. Great service, cleanliness, and great quality. I recommend this hotel whether it is for leisure or business purposes.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Advertencia
Reviews.Content: My husbands social club used this hotel several times for our annual social weekend trips. We visited Daytona during Memorial day weekend and Labor day weekend. We absolutely LOVE the staff and the hotel is always clean. We ask for a lot from the staff and they always pull through to accommodate us! The hotel is walking distance from everything! We would not stay anywhere else! Thank you Angie and Peggy Sue!

Reviews.Title: “not to bad”
Reviews.Author: billbob213
Reviews.Content: this hotel is very nice good service big rooms and good oceanview i would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Vacation”
Reviews.Author: dkzeus24
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were looking forward to a relaxing vacation first time in Daytona Beach, we chose hotel due to very reasonable rate and view. Upon arrival we were very disappointed with the quality of hotel my rating would be a 1 star hallways were flithy, rooms dirty, bugs on site. View was acceptable. Staff was very unprofessional avoid this needs much renovation.

Reviews.Title: “Could have been better”
Reviews.Author: cindyluvs2sing
Reviews.Content: I love that this hotel is beachfront. The parking is free, but the parking lot was a little crazy and not laid out very well. For the most part our rooms were clean and in neat order. The hotel was booked the first 2-3 days that we were there and our rooms didn't get cleaned until late in the day. We had ran out of towels, because when they did come the 2nd day, they didn't leave enough towels to replace the ones they took. One particular day, they didn't come at all to service our room. The two ladies that we dealt with upon checking in and checking out, were not very customer service oriented. Overall we had no specific problems. We would probably stay there again. We did not take advantage of their complimentary breakfast, but heard from other guests that it wasn't set up very well.

Reviews.Title: “Not so bad”
Reviews.Author: supercharge
Reviews.Content: I don't usually leave reviews for much of anything but I was really impressed with my overall experience at this hotel and I got to reading the mixed reviews on here and decided to chime in. For me everything went great. Check In was pleasant, room was clean, staff were nice, ocean view was priceless! The hotel is on the older side but is well kept. So as long as your not used to staying in a brand spanking new hotel this one really is pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Everyone gets one...”
Reviews.Author: 247HardWorker
Reviews.Content: I will give this place a pass because it was spring break time so everything was a bit odd as far as check-in goes. If you are not staying here around spring break when the kiddos are running wild I dont think you will have any issues. As for the staff being stressed they did not crack under the pressure.... Now . as for the condition of the room I got I was happy because from the outside I did not know what to expect in the inside. The room was nice. Very small but clean and comfortable for the 1 night I was there.

Reviews.Title: “Wave as you drive by this location”
Reviews.Author: John M
Reviews.Content: My wife and I chose to stay here due the past favorable experiences with the comfort inn & suites and the large heated pool sign. What a disappointment. The manager on duty at check in argued with us about what room we requested versus what they had as an upgrade available. We were staying one night only and did not need an efficiency, through she tried to sell us the room we declined many times and she had a difficult time accepting no. The pool was not heated the night we stayed and was disgustingly dirty. The decor of the hotel was run down and outdated. The hotel shows the signs of past convention abuse. The hotel only gets one star because the room was clean. The only positive of our stay. The Ac unit was next to bed, freezing myself and keeping my wife up most of the night from the extra noise. During our departure the hotel staff was arguing and fighting in the hallway, blocking our departure. The Holiday Inn express is 1 mile north and worth the extra money. Avoid this Comfort Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: PEIGOLFER
Reviews.Content: The hotel was average - Being on the ocean improved it's appeal.The room was clean and very good sized. The whole hotel is becoming dated & needs to be refreshed. It is well located

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay!”
Reviews.Author: Peggy H
Reviews.Content: We didn't have a rerservation, just stopped in on the off chance that a room was available. Peggy Sue was at the front desk, and was so very gracious and helpful! She let us know that Jeff Dunham was in town that afternoon, and we were able to get tickets. We decided on the ocean view room, and what a wonderful choice it was! It was such a fantastic view. Loved to sit on the balcony listening to the ocean... and the sunrises!!!! WOW!!!! The room, the whole property, was very clean! Every staff member there was very friendly, and very attentive! I would not hesitate to stay there again! Thank you Peggy Sue and Comfort Inn staff!

Reviews.Title: “Staff is SUPERB!”
Reviews.Author: rfsmithpjc
Reviews.Content: All front desk, breakfast, maintenance, and housekeeping staff members with whom we came in contact were friendly and helpful. Very service oriented!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Accomodation”
Reviews.Author: jerryjbamat
Reviews.Content: This Hotel has it all great rooms, location, cleaniness, And above the best staff (management,service and staff) one could as for in small resort facility. They all bend over backwards to make your stay pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “decent accommodation, very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: nascar3fan
Reviews.Content: My four night stay at this hotel was very good. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The front desk staff as well as the cleaning staff. I use a wheelchair to get around and would rate this property a 3/5. Most of it is good, but the front lobby can be a challenge to get into, as there is a curb right by the front door. You have to go down a few feet to get on the sidewalk. The other issue is the elevators. They are very small and cramped to get into. They work though, so better than a property with steps. Unfortunately, the stairs are far out of the way so everyone takes the elevator. It took all four days we were there to eventually discover the stairs, so it is no wonder no one uses them. The bathroom, although advertised as a wheelchair accessible bathroom, had a 2-inch lip in the shower, and I could not get my shower chair fully into the shower. Basically, the shower was inaccessible. The property was clean, the room was clean so no trouble there. The pool was okay, but not terribly inviting. There was also a wading pool for kids, but no hot tub. Slightly disappointing. The friendliness of the front desk staff increased my enjoyment of the stay at the property. it wasn't too far from Main Street, where we walked for the New Year's Eve festival. I never felt unsafe in this neighborhood. If I were going back to Daytona Beach and was looking for property in this price range, I would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “PEGGY SUE- THIS JOB IS NOT FOR YOU”
Reviews.Author: Christy P
Reviews.Content: Peggy Sue is very rude and unprofessional. DO NOT STAY HERE

Reviews.Title: “What a nightmare”
Reviews.Author: Tdogcat
Reviews.Content: This was the worst hotel we have ever stayed at. I could get past the parking hassles, the worn-out appearance, old thin towels and the not-so-great-neighborhood. The worst thing about this place is the rudeness of the management. They are on an incredible power trip.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I have come to expect from Comfort Inn and other Choice Hotels”
Reviews.Author: LUV2TRVLLUV2BEHOME
Reviews.Content: Be aware that if you have customer loyalty to Choice Hotels because of good experiences across the country this location is a disappointing exception. Being privately owed this location has put in place operational policies that are self-serving and leave the customer paying to jump through hoops at every stop: check-in, parking, pool, breakfast bar,check-out. I deduced that they have come to expect a very shady clientele in this location. I would not recommend this location if the trip you are seeking is a peaceful, relaxing one. However, if you are seeking a fast ride on the hotel industry's power trip have at it....the power trip you will experience in this location is sure to please.

Reviews.Title: “REALLY NICE PLACE”
Reviews.Author: Doug T
Reviews.Content: We drove from Orlando to Daytona to go to the Speedway for a fantastic tour for almost 2 hours dont miss it for $17 it was a great tour we saw every thing. The place is big and very nice. We found a treasure of a Dive Bar called the Half Time bar 1 block from this location you have to walk thru some parking lots but you dont have to drive. Thats the reason we chose it the rate was $59 a nite for luxury we didnt need but we needed to party down after all the traveling we have done.

Reviews.Title: “Still a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: 55229Sunshine
Reviews.Content: Still a great value for a beach front property. The parking leaves a lot to be desired. The elevator is very slow. Housekeeping was a little below par on this trip than the last time we stayed there. There were two days they never even came in to clean or to switch out the towels. We had to call. But overall a good stay.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible disappointment. Dirty and rude”
Reviews.Author: rncsue
Reviews.Content: Housekeeper supr rude. Lied to cover up mistake. Large cockroach in elevator. Pool area and stairs from pool to ocean black mold. Stayed there several years ago x2 trips. Hotel run down from past condition. Hugh disappointment. Many other nicer hotels in Daytona for same price. Reported to hotel manager with rude email in response. Do not recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Lots of Fun! Very clean hotel!”
Reviews.Author: jhenrys2011
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, especially when you consider the price. The entire staff is friendly and helpful. The hotel is very clean and well kept for an older hotel. The beach is amazing!!! We liked it so much we went back a few weeks later!!! Really had a great time!!! The only "negative" thing I can say is I was a little annoyed that the breakfast attendant did not restock breakfast items past 8:45. I understand breakfast is over at 9:30, but that didn't seem right. BUT it wouldn't stop me from coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Mediocre hotel, at best.”
Reviews.Author: Georgiagal02
Reviews.Content: We had an oceanfront room and when we first walked into the room, there was a strong mildew smell. The floor also felt damp, as the air conditioner didn't seem to be able to control the moisture in the air. The bedspreads both had stains on them and there appeared to be sand on the sheets on one of the beds. This hotel is considered to be non-smoking (no smoking in rooms or on balconies) but everyday we smelled smoke whenever we went out on our 4th floor balcony. We could never tell where it was coming from. One day I finally witnessed someone smoking on their balcony and I was able to report it. Smoking is allowed on the ground floor (located outside, under the hotel) and it literally seemed like mostly everyone staying in this hotel smoked and would be hanging out down there. There are 2 slow and old elevators that also feel like a sauna when you are in them. Housekeeping didn't come until after 5:30 pm one day and we had been out of the room for most of the day. Then, they didn't give us anymore toilet tissue. There is a nice area for breakfast, but on a busy Saturday there was a bottleneck created around the waffle iron. This made it hard to even enter the room and get food elsewhere. This hotel is mediocre, at best. We definitely were paying for the view, which was a really nice one. However, we won't be staying at the hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great beach hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Adventurousfam
Reviews.Content: This is a older hotel however it's very well upkept and the staff are friendly and helpful. Also for a limited service hotel I was very impressed to learn they have a night watchman who does everything from helping park cars to handling maitenance issues and working as a security gaurd later.into the night! I would highly reccomend this hotel for any one who wants to be in the heart of Daytona and dont require a full service hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent motel for the price”
Reviews.Author: cbierman
Reviews.Content: This Comfort Inn is right on the ocean. It measured up in every way to the quality one expects from a Comfort Inn--spacious rooms, clean, friendly staff, details well attended to, good complimentary breakfast. We stayed here 5 nights & enjoyed every minute.

Reviews.Title: “We could have been robbed in our sleep”
Reviews.Author: Dollface1013
Reviews.Content: This was by far the worst place I have ever stayed. The first thing that happened was that the sliding glass door handle fell off completely in my hand. When I called the front desk I was advised that they would be right there. They never showed up. The next thing I did was to run into a maintance man in the hall who advised me he would tell the next guy coming on shift. There was no way to lock the sliding door. Hours later ,we advised the front desk that we would be going across the street and would be right back. The management stated that we should of told them when we returned and they would of fixed it then. What a laugh. They didn't ever show up and we slept in an unsecured room all night. When I spoke with Managemnt I was advised that they offered to fix it when we decided to go get something to eat.I asked them why did they not fix it the first or second time that I advised them instead of trying to find a way of assuming no fault. Never will I ever stay at this place again and I will be sure to let everyone know. Also the place was dirty which I guess I am just to clean

Reviews.Title: “Find another hotel”
Reviews.Author: TimW43
Reviews.Content: The Choice Hotel chain has a lot of nerve calling this place a Comfort Suites. Closer to Rodeway Inn, or even Motel 6 might have been an upgrade. Looks like an old Best Western from the 70's that they came in and slapped some paint on. Very small rooms, with noisey A/C units. I would not stay here again under any circumstances.

Reviews.Title: “this hotel is average at best, will not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: aquino5043
Reviews.Content: room was clean although outdated. mini fridge and microwave was nice amenity. we were on the 4th floor and the elevator was very slow and scary. when we came out of one elevator we saw the maintenance man working on the one across from it. they make you wear red bands on the property to identify guests and charge $5 if you lose it. breakfast was decent but there were several guests eating at 0930 when it ended and the breakfast lady put up a closed sign and locked the door with us in there. this place is nothing special and I did not feel safe here. skip it.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel - Wedding/Vacation”
Reviews.Author: PAWillits
Reviews.Content: "I do not have one bad thing that I can honestly say about this hotel and its staff! The group of people that work at this particular hotel were over the top in service. Angie helped me book a block of 20 rooms for our upcoming beach wedding on 3/19/11. She kept me posted for almost 9 months on the guests and their scheduled arrival dates. My fiance' and I arrived on 3/14/11 as did some other guests but most arrived later in the week. We were greeted with a dozen roses in our suite congratulating us on our upcoming marriage. So sweet! We had made personalized welcome bags for all the guests and asked that they receive them upon arrival. The staff made sure that each room had the correct bag waiting to greet our guests for that extra little personal touch we hoped for. The wedding happened to fall during spring break and Angie & Peggy Sue made us feel as if there were not any other guests in their 'very full' hotel. This potentially stressful time was completely relaxing for everyone because of this great group of people. All of us that stayed at this hotel said they would return again because of the location, the rooms and most of all the staff! Thanks Again For Everything!!!!!!!!! ~ Paulette & Mark Willits ~"

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff and Location”
Reviews.Author: joe8386
Reviews.Content: Stayed for the weekend with my girlfriend and I had a great time. Great location on the beach and fast check in. Room was nice and clean. Appliances were clean and new. The breakfast was very good and they had newspapers and a tv in the breakfast area. Peggy Sue was extremely friendly and helpful in telling us some good places to see and how to get there. We really appreciated that. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced and run-down.”
Reviews.Author: Higginbotham69
Reviews.Content: While on business I stayed here on December 15. My government per diem was $90 per day and this place was $89, so I figured what the heck. It's on the water. Upon check-in I was told that I was only 1 of 2 guests booked in the entire hotel for the night. I asked if she would upgrade me to an ocean-view room. Fuhgeddaaboudit!. She said she'd have to charge me more. Sheesh. Talk about cheap. The entire place is run-down, and my room reminded me of one at an old, tired Super 8. At least it was clean. As for the free hot waffles in the morning as described on their web site, Fuhgeddaaboudit! "Free breakfast" was a thermos of coffee and non-dairy creamer. These people didn't go out of their way one iota to make my stay pleasant or comfortable. If you have to stay on the beach, spend a little more and stay at one of the higher-end national chains. If you don't have to be near the beach, try the Hampton Inn in town. At least for $89 bucks you know what you'll get.

Reviews.Title: “Summed Up in One Word - Gross”
Reviews.Author: bleifuss
Reviews.Content: Stayed here one night in December, although reservations were for 3 nights...thankfully I was able to get a room at the Hilton for the following 2 nights, for $20 less a night! The whole place is kind of creepy and definitely felt the need to perform a bedbug check upon check-in. Elevators probably dated back to the 70s as did the appliances in the suite. Pictures certainly can be deceiving as it looked nothing like on the website. Go elsewhere!

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay Here!”
Reviews.Author: speedracr88
Reviews.Content: I stayed here in January when the weather was cold. Our room was around 50 degrees when we checked in. We called the front desk they said the entire hotel was cold because of the weather and to lower our thermostat and put the fan on low, that would provide the most heat. We did this, it did not get any warmer, we froze that night. The next morning a lady at the continental breakfast told me her room was so hot she had to turn the heat off. We were heading out entire day on Friday to sight see so I told the manager about our heat problem she said it would be fixed. I told her we would be in that evening feel free to spend as much time fixing it as needed. When we returned around 8 pm that night we walked in the heat was on hi and the thermostat set to 90 degrees, however the room was still in the 50's or colder. We called the front desk, they sent a maintenance man up who said their heaters never put out much heat and our room was bigger than what the heater could heat. He adjusted it then said it should be warmer in about 30 minutes. We waited and it never got warmer. The front desk informed me there was nothing they could do. They could switch our room but it would still be cold because all hotels are cold in there in January. I told them they never fixed our heater. The manager refused to issue a refund for our upcoming night's stay even though we didn't even stay in our room more than 30 minutes to see if it would warm up. She said the heater was fixed, they wouldn't even go up and see how cold our room was. We checked out without our refund because we did not want to freeze another night again. We found the best hotel with a cheaper rate at the Nautilus Inn just down the road, much cheaper, newer and cleaner and WARMER!!! If you are looking for a nice relaxing hotel, do not stay here. It is loud, there was a homeless person sleeping outside the hotel, anyone has access to your room on the elevator, the elevators are SLOW and the management does not even attempt to make your stay a good one.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: RobinRaces
Reviews.Content: A last minute decision to go to the beach around the holidays to get away. Unfortunately we had a street side room vs ocean front we were expecting but with our last minute booking, it appeared all the ocean front rooms were full. The rooms were all updated and new inside. It was clean and housekeeping did a good job. The beds were comfy although some noise in the hallway by arriving guests who were inconsiderate. The breakfast room needs more than one waffle maker as we had to wait our turn to use it. And yes, the lady that was attending to the breakfast room was shaking her head in disgust as there was some cereal on the counter that needed cleaned up. So I "killed her with kindness" asking how she was doing and her total mood changed. She needs to either "like" her job or find another. Front desk was helpful and friendly. The pool area was clean and neat. Other than our disappointment of not having an ocean front room, our stay met our expectations for the price and was pet friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Best Deal in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: SoCalC8
Reviews.Content: It's Christmas Day and I'm in need of some ocean scenery without paying an astronomical rate - well Peggy Sue at the Comfort Inn hooked us up and made my Christmas that much better. Originally from Southern California, Christmas at the beach is the norm for me. On our drive from Orlando, I called several other hotels in town and they were asking for no less than $150 for an ocean view room - but we decided to stay here for $99 and I was very happy. It might not be the prettiest hotel in Daytona, but it's clean, the beds are comfortable, the shower is great and the staff was very cool. It was the perfect hotel for us. Plus, our room had a sliding glass door where we could sit out and watch the ocean. I was very happy here and am a fan of this place!

Reviews.Title: “A terrible hotel experience!”
Reviews.Author: RichShewmaker
Reviews.Content: My family chose this hotel for a family beach outing on my mother's 87th birthday. We took four rooms, including two "kitchen" suites. When I arrived with my mother, both my credit cards were "denied" by the hotel's card system, as were my mother's American Express card, and even her bank card. The desk clerk rudely insisted that "denied" meant that their system was fine, but the cards were bad, so it looked like we sere not going to be able to check in. I had to call AMEX on my cell phone and hand it to the desk clerk for the AMEX guy to give her an authorization code to accept the charge. As for the "kitchen" suites, my sister had brought an unbaked lasagna to prepare for Mom's birthday dinner, but neither her suite nor ours had an oven--only hot plates and tine microwaves. We called the desk and were informed that none of the "kitchen" suites have ovens. (We had previously stayed at the Quality Inn in Ormond Beach a mile or so north on the same street, and its kitchens had ovens, so an oven was not an unreasonable expectation.) None of the four rooms were cleaned or had beds made during our two day stay. At least, at check out, my credit card was accepted by the system, so Mom didn't actually have to pay for her own party.

Reviews.Title: “Not a value but a great trip”
Reviews.Author: 12voltmon
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Comfort Inn in Daytona and were happy with our stay. People on here have to understand that hotels will have rust and always in need of some repairs due to the salt water. The rooms where nice and clean and the maids were very nice and so was the mtc guy. The lady working the breakfast did have an attitude like she did not like her job, I noticed someone else mentioned that. The room was very pricey for the quality of the motel compared to what you could get at the Wyndham for twenty dollars more and you have to deal with all the locals coming to use your pool also. But we had a great trip other than that. I would stay here again if the price was right.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: 55229Sunshine
Reviews.Content: The people at Comfort Inn were very friendly and helpful. The room was great. Clean!!! Did not have the smell as some hotels/motels do at the beach. Easy access to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for an ocean front hotel”
Reviews.Author: manthamom
Reviews.Content: Nice rooms, good breakfast, nice pool, easy access to the beach

Reviews.Title: “'parking nightmare'”
Reviews.Author: MargeandSam
Reviews.Content: Very nice room on fourth floor with nice view of route A1A, ELEVATORS VERY SLOW AND SMALL.parking in and driving out of this motel is awful., THEN THE tour buses full of teen-agers arrived and blocked off half of the front parking lot, Then that night alot of yelling, pecking on doors, doors slamming wall banging, and maybe even jumping rope. The next morning at 7am the harley bikers were checking out just how loud they could make their bikes sound off and backfire. Fair warning,,,,, if you use the parking lot outback and can squeeze in, more than likely some genius will come in and park in the only lane to get in & out of it. We are from florida and love it here, I would avoid this one.....

Reviews.Title: “Great Place and great value”
Reviews.Author: Ekwyne
Reviews.Content: We were traveling home from Miami and wanted to stay near the shore. To our amazement this place had such an attractive rate we were able to stay ON the shore. We had a beautiful room with a balcony facing out to the ocean. We had a delightful breakfast the next morning from the lobby but eaten on that balcony. Our car was safe off the street and we completely enjoyed our stay

Reviews.Title: “We really enjoyed our stay here and can't wait to come back!”
Reviews.Author: BeachJunkie4fun
Reviews.Content: The staff here were incredible and the rooms were very nice & clean even considering this is a older hotel, The pool area is very pleasant complete with a beach view! The location is right in the heart of Daytona Beach around plenty to do and see, we couldn't be happier with our choice to stay here, it was a memorable experience we hope to visit again real soon!

Reviews.Title: “This Beachfront hotel is AWESOME!”
Reviews.Author: Petrollaw
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay, the staff are very accomodating, the view of the ocean is incredible, a cool pool and it's close to everything you would want in Daytona Beach and I really can't say enough good about it, if you love the beach and want a clean, well run, safe environment, this is THE place.

Reviews.Title: “Life saver!”
Reviews.Author: ihearttrees
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I needed to get away for the weekend, a lot of stress back home. So we decided to drive down to Daytona. After a terrible experience at another motel down the road (one that caused me to have an asthma attack the second I walked in the room) we decided to come to the Comfort Inn. The rates were reasonable, and the woman at the front desk was very cheerful and friendly. We were checked in and in our room within 5 minutes. It was wonderful. The room was very clean, and the location is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Nicely appointed but annoyed by neighbors (young "Breakers" and bike noise.”
Reviews.Author: dantheman38
Reviews.Content: I made a mistake by reviewing the Comfort Inn, Ormond Beach instead of the Comfort Inn Oceanfront in Daytona Beach. I apologize for the misunderstanding. Either way, our stay at this place was great. We had a smoke-free premesis, including the balconies. I smoked on our balcony but kept it "low profile", butt canned my butts and kept it clean so there were no issues with us. However, Young "Breakers" kept us and the hotel management QUITE busy with them breaking things so they werent the least bit worried about us. Rooms were meticulously clean upon entry and smelled wonderful. Nice view of ocean and pool from the balcony. Id rate this hotel a 3-4 stars for couples and families during the off-season times. Guests of the younger generation be prepared to be watched at all times. If you break stuff, you pay for it! The front desk people were VERY adiment about this. Id recommend this place to couple looking to "get-away" for few days and YES I would go back. If you check in on a weekday it is cheaper and then leave by friday. cheaper that way. The Beach was great with not too much noise up and down the beach from where we were located but some. sorry about the misunderstanding with another one of my reviews. Take care, be safe, and "get-away" when you can. Dantheman

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: walkingmom
Reviews.Content: A really good value. AARP rate. Excellent front desk staff. Right on the beach. Clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced”
Reviews.Author: skibumma70
Reviews.Content: The hotel is old and outdated, the pool is crappy.. The room was large enough, and has highspeed internet.. The stovetop didn't work, and there was a fridge. For the $99 I paid, I had a view of a liquor store across the street, and loud traffic. What you are paying for is a decent location on the strip, the hotel itself is nothing special.. Just an old hotel with no services.. No bar, no food, a room with a small pool area.

Reviews.Title: “NIce sunrise”
Reviews.Author: dmacnmi
Reviews.Content: We were passing through Daytona Beach and wanted to stay in an oceanfront suite.. after price checking a few other hotels, we went here because the price was right. ($109.00 for an oceanfront suite). However, what a dump!! We were given an oceanfront suite all right.. the view was the only thing good about the room (as long as we didn't look to our left... there was a ransacked hotel to the left with a pool full of brown water & destroyed patio area.) Anyway, the walk to our room was through a mildew smelling hall, leading to a dirty room.... we asked for nonsmoking, but there were cigarette butts under the table and old pizza boxes under the bed. The floor looked so grungy that we didn't dare walk on it in bare feet. On top of it all, minutes after we checked out, we discovered my husband had left his military uniform (he was on R&R from Iraq) hanging in the room. We asked to go back up to the room to retrieve it, the person at the front desk told us housekeeping would check. They contacted housekeeping and minutes later we were told there was no uniform in the room... (we had just checked out about 10 minutes prior). We asked them if we could check ourselves, they had housekeeping escort us to our room.. to miraculously find no uniform hanging where he had left it. Now, how does that happen?!?! Hmmm. Anyway, the one good thing I can say is that we did enjoy being steps away from the beach and the sunrise from our balcony. Will we stay at that location again??... NEVER!

Reviews.Title: “Heed these poor reviews - Avoid this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Thomamy
Reviews.Content: We wanted a weekend away at the beach, so I called this hotel and explained that we wanted a beachfront room/suite for a family of 6. We were told that we could stay in one of their efficiencies - complete with a kitchen and separate bedroom and ON the beachside. Once we arrived at the hotel, we were given a small room with only 2 beds, but it WAS on the beachside. The room was not very clean - found dirt on towels, crusty stuff on the beds, stains & worn spots on the carpet, smoky odor even though it was supposed to be a non-smoking room... Fortunately (due to the condition) it wouldn't work for our family because we needed more than 2 beds. I went down and spoke with the desk clerks and was told that NONE of their efficiencies were on the beach side. I explained that that was not what I was told when I booked the hotel. We thought maybe we could take two adjoining room for the same price as long as it was facing the beach. They looked for other rooms for us, but said none were available. Due to the 100% satisfaction guarantee, we were able to get our money refunded, but were very disappointed in being misled when we made the reservation and in the poor condition the hotel was in.

Reviews.Title: “Unsanitary Stay Away!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We arrived and waited almost 2 hours past the time promised. we finally waited at the pool while the "were cleaning " the room. That took an hour. When we did get up to the room apparently their idea of clean does not include the bathroom There is NO way the toilet was cleaned as we found CLOGGED TOILET, WITH FLOATING EXCREMENT. The staffs answer was to come up after 4 requests and hand my daughter a plunger at the door and tell her to fix it..... Finally a desk clerk came because the cant afford a maintanence I guess. Put alot in my mind as to what else was unclean. Stay away and hopefully stay healthy

Reviews.Title: “Awful service, would not recommend.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I absolutely would not recommend this to anyone. My brother and I looked it up on the internet about 3 weeks before heading to Daytona. We called, made the reservations, and made sure everything was all set. On the phone, the man was quite rude and asked my brother to repeat the dates about 3 times, so my brother did. We dismissed his rudeness as.. whatever. Upon arriving, they told us our reservations had been made for the week after, and actually made rude remarks about my parents not understanding English, because we're Hispanic so their accents are really thick. My little brother and I both speak perfect English, and after being treated like absolute crap, he finally exploded and said, "Do I sound like I don't speak English? Maybe you should check yours!" (everyone who worked there had really thick Indian accents, so I don't understand what their problem was.) They then told us that we would have to pay $300 more dollars than planned and it was our mistake. They repeatedly told us it was our mistake, actually, and were really REALLY rude about it. Finally, they told us we should just take it because we "wouldn't find any other place as low as that on such short notice." ..well, we did. Sucks for them. I would not reccomend this place to anyone; I've never been so mad in my life at a hotel or something stupid like that. Ugh.

Reviews.Title: “Very outdated hotel.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: When we arrived our room wasn't ready until 3:30-standard I was told. Check in was for 12:00 according to itinerary. Also was given a roadside room after reserving an "oceanside room." Went to get my room I thought I reserved, on the water. Was told "ocean side" doesn't mean "ocean side"-it means the HOTEL is on the ocean side of-the-street. Was told I misunderstood when I made my reservation. The rooms, forget what side they were on, were GROSS! The carpet must have been wet mopped and it was wet the entire time we were in our room. Wet socks. Had to wear shoes in the room the whole time. Everything was old and musty. Sliding door was hard to open. Was a chore to get housekeeping to part with any clean towels. They did't seem to want to give any away! They were smooth as sandpaper and as big as a piece when you did get some. All in all, a crappy hotel. Stay anywhere else but here.

Reviews.Title: “Great Bargain”
Reviews.Author: Mylisa1
Reviews.Content: Rooms were recently redone and were nice and I'm very picky to the point of leaving other hotels after looking at our room. Very Clean. Magnetic strip entry to rooms. The rooms have an ironing board, coffee maker, hair dryer, and you can request a private balcony facing ocean with 2 chairs on it. Pool area also looked redone. Pool was not heated during our stay and the water was too cold to swim in. I asked why it was not heated and was told that once the air temperature goes above 70 degrees that they do not heat it. It needs to be heated in Dec. no matter what the air temperature. Free Breakfast was good. They had donuts, muffins, cereals, english muffins and waffles that you poured the mix yourself onto the waffle maker and was very good. They had an attendant there who was very helpful and kept everything clean and filled. The office is open 24/7 and the staff was very polite. The shower was very good as rated by my husband, the shower expert. It had several settings on the shower head, all of which worked. Never ran out of hot water either. I would stay there again. It's a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “yucky pool, nice people”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Sides of the pool were slick with sunscreen residue, room was moldy, staff was extremely nice. would stay there again in a pinch otherwise I would skip it.

Reviews.Title: “Great for Spring Breakers!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: What can I say, the boys and I felt like going to Daytona Beach for Spring break, so we did. We first dealt with the desk clerks. They were very friendly and helpful. We got to the room and realized we had a full kitchen with plates, silverware, stove, microwave, fridge, toaster, ect. This was great as we were there for a week and didn't feel like eating fastfood 3 times a day for a week. City View balcony was great. Room was clean and in working order. Maids were very friendly. Met so many other spring breakers too. Only complaints was that 1 elevator was out, pool was a little cloudy (probably from all the booze being dumped into it). But we had a great time with very few and minor complaints. We would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “You will be staying in a S*** hole here”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Spring Break Nightmear>>>drunkin teen throwing bottles off balconies-running nude in hallways-loud & offensive-open sex in lighted pool at night-police roaming hallways..How does hotel handle this?? they cater to it..they even remove the fire extinguishers from the hallways and keep them in a closet so the children don't use them up. ...Then they over charge my bill by $ 1,500.00 in some strange accident. elevators were being fixed( only one of 2 working) look out wen it rains the doors leak and the carpet becomes indoor/outdoor. poor condition/poorly maintained/pool was cloudy water/small parking lot so watch your rental car...please stay away

Reviews.Title: “DON"T GO HERE!!!”
Reviews.Author: modestconsumer
Reviews.Content: I should have believed previous reviews. Pool looked like weak ice tea for starts. Before I made this reservation I spoke directly to the manager. She asssured me the suite would be OCEAN FRONT-New and a great experience. First of all you can only see the ocean if you stood on the far right of the balcony at turned your head sideways. Our air conditioner did not work. I tried getting a different room that night but the woman at the desk was the only one there and she couldn't help. She couldn't get an extra blanket (to make the sofa bed more comfortable springs were coming through it for my daughter). She was busy with many other problems and asked me to talk to the manager in the morning. Other people were complaining about air conditioner problems, dirty rooms etc... She was only working the desk for 8 days I believe. The manager the next morning was rude. She told me that there is not a suite on the property that is ocen froont. She told me if I didn't like it leave but I had to be out by 11. (it was 10) I went to the Inn on the Beach-great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”
Reviews.Author: flysan
Reviews.Content: Quite a dump actually. And we are frequent travelers. I think I got bit by bed bugs as my legs were covered with bites the next day. Was booked for 2 nights, only stayed one, had to get out of there. Sure the view and location is great, but there have got to be better options for this price ($100). The attitude of the staff at check-in was bad, but I figured it was because of what they have to put up with during spring break. The coffee pot in the room was dirty, and after spending considerable time cleaning it and filling it up it wouldn't turn on! I'm disappointed that I actually read the reviews here before I booked, and in the future will be more careful using this website.

Reviews.Title: “Hated the Comfort Inn and Suites”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We attempted to stay here the last week of June 2003 for 1 night. There was no parking. The hallways smelled like cat litter. The room had many broken things in the bathroom. A cigerette butt in the toilet when we first got there. The view of the ocean was leaning out over the railing, past the awful looking building to the side. There were piles of garbage obstucting our view on the balcony. The room had a funny smell. We demanded our credit card be refunded. After much disagreement, they didn't charge us for our stay. We left immediately. B

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service, View, and Price”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Wow, it seems the other reviewers stayed at a different hotel. The service I got from checking to checkout was great. The view was second to none on the beach. My room was not only clean but the linen and toiletries were restocked daily. The complimentary breakfast - delicious - bagels, cream cheese, donuts, danish, cereals, english muffins, juice, coco, coffee. All of this at a great price. In a word...Perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Two-day stay a mixed review”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The first impression of our room was, "What, we are paying how much for this?" That impression was dispelled somewhat, however, by the view from opur balcony. Overall, our Saturday and Sunday night stay was a mixed experience. The good: The breakfast bar was a treat. Not only was donuts and coffee provided -- which is what I really expected -- but bagles, cream cheese, cereal and milk, orange and apple juice and muffins were also provided. The staff was friendly and as helpful as they could be given the restraints placed on them by management. The bad: The fitted sheets on our bed did not fit. They would come off as soon as you set on the bed. Room service did a very poor job of cleaning the room. The safe in our room had no key. It had been lost and never replaced. The office also had no other options for us to allow us to safekeep our valuables, requiring us to pack them with us everywhere we went or risk leaving them in the room. When we entered the room the air conditioning cover was off of our unit. The people across the hall from us had no air conditioning for two nights. The maintenance man said there were some electrical problems. However, our air worked fine. The price for our room, which had a balcony overlooking the ocean, was moderate compared to many of the other beachside hotels. On Saturday there were no rooms available along our section of the beach. On Sunday, however, there were many rooms available and rates were much m,ore reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Not what you pay for !”
Reviews.Author: Lorraine7
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Comfort Inn for a week in a kitchenette. The Microwave didn't work. The refrigerator didn't keep anything cool. There were coffee filters in the room, but no coffee pot as in other rooms. The air conditioner barely kept the room cool so the room was quite hot. The safe located in the closet had a missing key that the office couldn't find even though they said they'd get one made. Housekeeping never did clean the toilet, and in a week, the last nite was the only time the sheets got changed. Housekeeping did not leave towels and when one would go to ask for some they would argue about giving them out. Housekeeping broke a souvenir that was on a nitestand and didn't say anything about it, only cleaned it up. We only noticed because there was one huge shred of glass left on the floor. There was a huge bug in the room that crawled on one person's hand while they were sleeping - thank goodness that was early on the morning we were leaving. All in all, this place is ok to stay at if all you're looking for is somewhere to get out of the sun, but for service it ranks horrid for the price paid for the benefit of staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Not a Recommended Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel is definitely geared toward a younger crowd. The parking is inadequate. The rooms are not very clean. Had to call the front desk for towels several times because housekeeping failed to leave them in the room. Ocean view apartment is an inaccurate description. To see the ocean, you have to walk out onto the balcony and lean over the rail to be able to see the ocean - aside from the fact there is an older buidling next door that most definitely obstructs the view. Would not recommend this hotel to anyone.

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Inn & Suites Daytona Beach
HotelInfo.Address: 730 North Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
